### V1.1.0 ###
============================
Based on tag v1.1.0 projectCHIP/connectedhomeip repo.
 
+ add platform/stm32wb integration for matter: 
  - platform/stm32wb/BLEManagerImpl.cpp
  - platform/stm32wb/BLEManagerImpl.h
  - platform/stm32wb/BLEPlatformConfig.h
  - platform/stm32wb/CHIPDevicePlatformEvent.h
  - platform/stm32wb/CHIPPlatformConfig.h
  - platform/stm32wb/ConfigurationManagerImpl.cpp
  - platform/stm32wb/ConfigurationManagerImpl.h
  - platform/stm32wb/ConnectivityManagerImpl.cpp
  - platform/stm32wb/ConnectivityManagerImpl.h
  - platform/stm32wb/DeviceInfoProviderImpl.cpp
  - platform/stm32wb/DeviceInfoProviderImpl.h
  - platform/stm32wb/DeviceNetworkProvisioningDelegateImpl.cpp
  - platform/stm32wb/DeviceNetworkProvisioninDelegateImplh.h
  - platform/stm32wb/DiagnosticDataProviderImpl.cpp
  - platform/stm32wb/DiagnosticDataProviderImpl.h
  - platform/stm32wb/DnssdImpl.cpp
  - platform/stm32wb/DnssdImpl.h
  - platform/stm32wb/InetPlatformConfig.h
  - platform/stm32wb/KeyValueStoreManagerImpl.cpp
  - platform/stm32wb/KeyValutStoreManagerImpl.h
  - platform/stm32wb/PlatformManagerImpl.cpp
  - platform/stm32wb/PlatformManagerImpl.h
  - platform/stm32wb/STM32Config.cpp
  - platform/stm32wb/STM32Config.h
